Extractable HTML Tables

Source: vignettes/extractable-html-tables.Rmd
extractable-html-tables.Rmd
gt(data = sleep) %>%
  fmt_scientific(columns = vars(extra))
extra group ID
7.00 × 10-1 1 1
-1.60 1 2
-2.00 × 10-1 1 3
-1.20 1 4

3.40 1 6

2.00 1 10
